it.apice.sapere.api.node.agents
Interface SAPEREAgentSpec

All Known Implementing Classes:
DisplayAgent, DisplayVLCService, FOAFPersonAgent, PersonAgent, ResVLCIniter, TempAnalyzer, TempSensor
public interface SAPEREAgentSpec

This interface represents the specification of a SAPEREAgent behaviour.

Author:
Paolo Contessi

Method Summary
 void behaviour(LSAFactory factory, LSAParser parser, LSAspace space, LogUtils out, SAPEREAgent me)
           Agent main-cycle.
 

Method Detail

behaviour

void behaviour(LSAFactory factory,
               LSAParser parser,
               LSAspace space,
               LogUtils out,
               SAPEREAgent me)
               throws Exception

Agent main-cycle.

Parameters:
factory - Reference to LSA Factory
parser - Reference to LSA Parser
space - LSA-space Access Point
out - Reference to logging facility (should be used in place of System.out and System.err)
me - Reference to the agent itself
Throws:
Exception - Each uncaught exception occurred in the agent main-cycle. Causes agent termination
